title: 79x3: Interpretation of Former Version of 18 U.S.C. § 207
summary:
Former 18 U.S.C. § 207(g) did not apply to situation in which law firm with a former Government attorney as a partner represented a client in a matter in which the former Government attorney participated.  

Notes: [cites former version of 18 U.S.C. § 207]
